title: Riot help.

replies.body: Don't worry, I looked into this for you and see that your ticket has been escalated to our account team.  They'll help you with any recovery!  There may be a bit of time for a response based on the current size of the queue, so it's important that you don't reply to the ticket until you receive a response or create duplicate tickets.  Hang tight and rest easy knowing you'll be in good hands!
Thank you :) I was getting worried it wasn't on the radar at all. My thoughts are at ease!
